terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils
Class ModelLoader

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.ModelLoader
public class ModelLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of utilities for loading 3D models from URL or file path. Models can be in the form of a VRML file or a Java 3D class or source files.

Method Detail

loadModelFromName

public static javax.media.j3d.Node loadModelFromName(java.lang.String name)
Loads a 3D model. Tries to load the model in various ways until one worKs or they all fail.

Parameters:
name - URL/file path of model to be loaded.
Returns:
Node containing the model root. Null if none.

loadVrmlFromName

public static javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup loadVrmlFromName(java.lang.String name)
Loads a VRML model.

Parameters:
name - URL/file path of model to be loaded.
Returns:
Node containing the model root.

loadObjectFromName

public static java.lang.Object loadObjectFromName(java.lang.String name,
                                                  java.lang.Class type)
Loads and instantiates an object of the specified class type from an arbitrary name.

Parameters:
name - Name referencing the class to be loaded.
type - Class type of the new object. If null then the type will not be verified.
Returns:
New object. Null if class not found, not loaded, or wrong type.

loadClassFromName

public static java.lang.Class loadClassFromName(java.lang.String name)
Loads an arbitrary class from an arbitrary name. The name can be a class name (e.g. foo.class), a file name (e.g. C:/foo/bar.java), or an URL (e.g. http://host:80/foo/bar.class#myref). The extension can be ".class", ".java", or none.

The class is resolved from the name by successively removing the leading path element until a class is loaded or the name is empty.

Parameters:
name - Name referencing the class to be loaded.
Returns:
Loaded class ready for instantiation. Null if class not found of loaded.
